title: Special Topics in Jewish Studies; Introduction to Classical Hebrew
description: Prerequisite: HEBR111; or students who have taken courses with comparable content may contact the department. Formerly: HEBR401. Readings of the Bible and other classical texts in original Hebrew. Emphasis on classical grammar and vocabulary, and reading of textual passages. Also offered as: JWST 260. Credit only granted for: JWST260 or HEBR298A.
